principles.title: Our Principles
principles.description: These are the core values that guide everything we do at Bull Bitcoin.

privacy.title: Privacy and security by default
privacy.description: No other crypto exchange has the technology, skill, ethical code and courage. Our non-custodial model and software infrastructure is designed to protect you at all costs.

excellence.title: Operational excellence
excellence.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standard of professionalism, and so should you. As our client, your experience is that with Bull Bitcoin everything always just works flawlessly.

integrity.title: Integrity and honesty
integrity.description: We are driven by a strict moral code. We do not have investors pressuring us to cut corners and compromise our values. We do not mislead or misdirect our clients. Unlike other exchanges, we do not have hidden fees and hidden spreads.

customer.title: Customer obsession
customer.description: We treat our clients like we would members of our own family. No chatbot, no support tickets: you always talk to a real human. We go above and beyond because we truly care about making your Bitcoin experience a success, secure and pleasant.

technology.title: Technological mastery
technology.description: Bull Bitcoin distinguishes itself by having the highest technical sophistication of any crypto exchange on the planet. We are the fountainhead others follow, always on the bleeding edge.

flexibility.title: Flexibility and creativity
flexibility.description: We accommodate complicated needs and transactions. We care only about delivering results, even if it means changing our processes or inventing new technologies to do it.

features.title: Features that set us apart
features.description: Discover the core advantages that make our platform unique and powerful for your Bitcoin journey.

security.title: Non-custodial security
security.description: Your Bitcoin, your keys. We never hold your funds, ensuring complete control and security over your digital assets.

lightning.title: Lightning-fast transactions
lightning.description: Experience instant Bitcoin payments with our Lightning Network integration, perfect for everyday transactions.

privacy.title: Privacy by design
privacy.description: Built-in privacy features including Tor integration and CoinJoin support to keep your transactions confidential.

investment.title: Automated investment strategies
investment.description: We enable four different Bitcoin investment strategies: Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA), Value Averaging, Lump Sum and HODL. Set it and forget it - let our algorithms do the work while you focus on what matters most.

about.title: About Bull Bitcoin
about.description: Founded in 2013, Bull Bitcoin has been at the forefront of Bitcoin innovation in Canada and beyond. We are a team of Bitcoin maximalists, cypherpunks, and freedom advocates dedicated to making Bitcoin accessible to everyone.
about.mission: Our mission is simple: to provide the most secure, private, and user-friendly Bitcoin services on the planet. We believe that Bitcoin is the future of money, and we're here to help you navigate that future with confidence.
about.ceo_quote: Bitcoin is not just a technology—it's a movement toward individual sovereignty and financial freedom. At Bull Bitcoin, we're building the tools to make that vision a reality.
